Content: Organizations that have a holding in a colony will use the technology
level of the colony in that holding, since the holding is thought of as

deeply integrated in the colony.
This permits multiple entities to
form knowledge sharing( research outposts or one party to piggy-bag
their specific research (like module generation) on the general efforts

of the host empire.
This applies to general knowledge technology
not to specific things like ship blueprints, which can be assumed to be
